markdown:
<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Ankhrav](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=361)</title>

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 20 <sup>1.1</sup>

Ankhravs are immense, burrowing, insectile predators, considered by inhabitants of the rural areas of the world to be an all-too-common plague.

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Ankhrav](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2822) (Creature 3), [Ankhrav Hive Mother](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2823) (Creature 8)
name: Ankhrav
